channel.title: bitxhub on Pseudoyu
channel.description: Recent content in bitxhub on Pseudoyu

item.title: BitXHub Cross-chain Plugin (Fabric) Source Code Analysis
item.description: Preface I previously mentioned that BitXHub cross-chain platform by QulianTech is a relatively comprehensive open-source cross-chain solution in the industry. It mainly optimizes the functionality, security, and flexibility of the cross-chain process through relay chain, gateway, and plugin mechanisms. Currently, our company’s team is working on a cross-chain module for a BaaS platform. I am responsible for the cross-chain adapter part, which corresponds to the listening module and application chain
